faq.question: Does it work for all subjects?
faq.answer: Yes! SummarizePDF works with textbooks across all subjects: science, math, history, literature, business, and more.

faq.question: Can I use this for exam prep?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our summaries are designed to help you study efficiently. Focus on key concepts and save hours of reading time.

faq.question: What about math and science textbooks?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI handles technical content including formulas, equations, diagrams, and problem examples.

faq.question: How many chapters can I summarize?
faq.answer: Free plan: 10 chapters/month. Starter: 50/month. Pro: 200/month. Team: Unlimited for study groups.

faq.question: Is this considered cheating?
faq.answer: No! SummarizePDF is a study tool that helps you understand material faster. You still need to learn and comprehend the content.
